item.description:
Would you like the opportunity of positively transforming your job search?
Are you aware you already possess the most powerful tool available for solving
life challenges?

It's your own mind!

Your subconscious mind is the key to creating all areas of your life, especially
when you learn how to guide your mind in a positive direction.

This powerful presentation is loaded with benefits for confidence-building,
stress management, and staying motivated - areas that challenge today's
job seeker.

Whatever your goals and career ambitions, this presentation will reinforce
your own inner strengths, bringing forth in you a new level of strength
and confidence to ensure your job search success.

You'll also enjoy a safe group hypnosis session, facilitated by
Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist, designed to help you relax
and stay calm, even under the most stressful interview conditions.

Reservations required. Please RSVP directly to Career Source Center.

 

For more info:

http://yourcareersource.com/events_evening_speaker_series.php

 

- or -

http://www.hypnosis.ws

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Powerful Steps to Increase Job Search Confidence
